channel.title: elasticsearch on Ferzerkerx
channel.description: Recent content in elasticsearch on Ferzerkerx

item.title: Repo-stats
item.description: Overview: Metrics are calculated for each file for every commit It’s possible to get contribution per author Each subdirectory of a file is a category It’s possible to get authors based on a keyword It’s possible to get filenames based on a keyword Contribution percentage by category. (shows a bar chart) Contribution per developer for each category. (shows a pie chart)
